title: Naan Pirandha Nerama Lyrics Kannukulle
stanzas:
Naan pirandha nerama
ammaa
nee ennai petra neramaa

eththanai perukku
naan baaramaa iruppen
indha baarathai
eppadi naan poruppen.
ammaa
indha vazhvu thaevaiyaa

Naan pirandha nerama
ammaa
nee ennai petra neramaa

verulagam sendru
nee enaku kaattinaai
unmai allavaa.
ammaa indha thunbam
thaevaiyaa

Naan pirandha nerama
ammaa
nee ennai petra neramaa
